content: closed using kitchener stitch round 2 sm k to 3 sts before marker 2 k2tog weave in all ends k1 sm work in ribbed pattern as established to marker 3 sm k1 ssk k to end of round i love to see your projects please tag repeat rounds one and two until the stitch #alittlebitsheepish and @alittlebitsheepish on count is back to the cast on figure- 40 44 48 social media when you share 52 56 sts you can find more of my patterns at www ravelry com/designers/fiona-hamilton- foot maclaren/patterns for pattern support please get in touch via the rib pattern from the leg continues down contact@alittlebitsheepish co uk the foot until it is the right length this pattern and all images are copyright held by fiona hamilton-maclaren 2013 all rights sm k to marker 2 sm work in ribbed pattern reserved as established to marker 3 sm k to end of round repeat until foot is 3 5 4 4 5 5 5 5 cm less than desired length removing markers apart from start of round marker on your final www alittlebitsheepish co uk round © f hamilton-maclaren 2013 these socks are made for walking page 3
